item.title: My first Post
item.description: My first ever Shiny App When I started this semester, I never realized I would be preparing my first ever Shiny App using R language. It is a great learning experience and I had fun creating this simple App. You can find it here: https://manideep999.shinyapps.io/Problemset3-Manideep/. What started out as a regular homework problem, turned into something amazing! This App creates a wordcloud plot output by taking inputs of words from three different Shakespere Novels.
